CustomField.description: Days from Term Letter Sent to Client to Census Uploaded
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c ), TODAY()- Transfer_Letter_sent_to_client__c , Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c - Transfer_Letter_sent_to_client__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Days from Term Letter Sent to Client to Census Uploaded
CustomField.label: Time To Census Conv KPI
